Name: Jean Gabin
Ingredients: 10 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
75 ml Milk (whole milk/full 3-4% fat) steamed foaming
Instructions: POUR first 3 ingredients into a warmed heat-resistant glass and STIR until maple syrup dissolves before POURING heated milk into the drink.
Review: Beats hot chocolate as a nightcap.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 1986 by Charles Schumann in Munich, Germany and published in his 1995 American Bar Book .
Nutrition: One serving of Jean Gabin contains 144 calories
